marklogic.body: Did anyone notice the dead Cold stare on George Zimmerman's face? They say racism is dead and we must forget about what was done to black people during slavery. I have two good reasons why we mus never forget what was done to our ancestors (1) The descendants of the slave owners now enjoy the profits accumulated during slavery. (2) Beside the crucifixion of Jesus Christ here is no other heinous Acts committed in this world to compete with slavery. However, people of color is a forgiving kind. They hold no grudges, but we mus not forget, because even the Jews after committing murder they get away with everything then they tell their children in the womb never forget while they are the most hateful and most greedy and wicked people that ever walked the earth. The Jews are instigating WW III
